architectural_notes: Multi-admin authentication system required for partner access

imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Orange Vixen table tennis ball product photo showing 'ORIGINAL Vixen T.T.F.I Approved 3 STAR' branding on an orange 40mm ball (vixen-tt-ball.dim_400x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create an admin orders page at /admin/orders that displays all orders with customer name, items ordered, delivery address, payment method, and order status
Update the Vixen T.T Ball product image to use the uploaded orange table tennis ball image (Vixen T.T Ball Top Orange (40mm) Table Tennis Ball-1.webp)
Add multi-admin support by allowing the current admin to grant admin privileges to other users by their Internet Identity principal

new_feature_requests.summary: Add admin orders page to view all incoming orders with customer details
Add real-time notifications for new orders
Update product image for table tennis ball
Add multi-admin support to allow partner as admin
